blogPost.excerpt: Refty collects twice as many references in half the time, turning them into actionable insights. Trust long-term experiences over intuition!

previous.excerpt: Hasura helps developers and organisations build and ship modern applications & APIs faster by making data instantly accessible over a realtime GraphQL & REST APIs.
previous.title: Hasura GraphQL Engine 2.0 - Instant realtime GraphQL for all your data

localize.tagline: 为您的所有数据提供即时的实时GraphQL

localize.description: Hasura通過實時的GraphQL和REST API使數據可即時訪問，幫助開發者和組織更快地構建和發佈現代應用程序和API。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有數據提供即時的實時GraphQL

next.excerpt: Improve your teams collaboration and invite them to your very own shared digital whiteboard. Just start a new project and draw away. Our web whiteboard is incredibly fast and simple to use, so anyone can do it. Yeah including Phil from accounting.
next.title: Online Whiteboard - Easy to use online whiteboard where you can share anything

localize.description: 改善你的团队协作，邀请他们到你自己的共享数字白板。只需开始一个新的项目，然后画出来。我们的网络白板使用起来非常快速和简单，所以任何人都可以做到这一点。是的，包括会计界的Phil。
localize.tagline: 易于使用的在线白板，你可以分享任何东西。

localize.description: 改善你的團隊協作，邀請他們到你自己的共享數字白板。只需開始一個新的項目，然後畫出來。我們的網絡白板使用起來非常快速和簡單，所以任何人都可以做到這一點。是的，包括會計界的Phil。
localize.tagline: 易於使用的在線白板，你可以分享任何東西。
